/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street, lined with brick buildings, extends into the distance, creating a sense of depth and perspective. Trees and power lines add elements of nature and urban infrastructure to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the buildings and gives the viewer a unique viewpoint, as if they were part of the scene. The colors in the image are vivid and bright, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
